name: Bomb Sworders
detailed_description:
Finally, a 100% accurate bomb-swording simulator!
Unique, fast-paced 2-to-4 player couch-multiplayer game

Hit bombs with your sword to take over the level and dominate your opponents!

Basics

  • Strike bombs with your sword to turn them your color
  • When a bomb's fuse runs out.. it explodes, creating a blast zone
  • What's a blast zone? It's an area that's dangerous for your opponents. Blast zones stick around, so..
  • .. you can use them to take over more-and-more territory... *or*, with expert timing, you can fling a just-about-to-explode bomb at a hapless opponent (We call that a snipe shot)
  • Eliminate all opponents to win the match!

What

  • Friendly for beginners (ages 7+)
  • Tuned for high-level competitive play

Featuring

  • Fancy movement: jumps, bounces, dashes, recoil
  • Items: bombs, dynamite, cannons, and freezers (stops enemies in their tracks!)
  • Bomb hitting, sword throwing, explosion escaping, player-pushing-into-peril action
  • Devious trickery? Indeed
  • High skill ceiling
  • Teams! (Or alternatively: no teams!)
  • Competitive tutorial *AND* an in-game in-depth reference guide featuring videos and explanations of many of the mechanics!



Become a Bomb Sworder today, and..
Turn friends into enemies! Turn enemies into rubble!
